page.title: 06ECOLOGY, TEMPERATURE
page.content: TEMPERATURES AT PONT BLAEN-CWM DDU The station at Pont Blaen-Cwm ddu is representative of much of the farm land in the Senni valley.On average it is about 1 degree warmer than at the top of Fan Frynych so that the warmest month is about 13 degrees Celsius and the coldest is about 3 degrees. The lag effect between spring temperatures at sea-level and at this intermediate height is discernable, though the difference in time is only one month. Thus the average temperat- ure in March at Swansea is experienced in April at a height of 350 metres in the Senni valley.
